about_the_game:
This is a mini puzzle game for cooperative puzzle-solving abilities that may test the emotional strength of the relationship between friends/partners, requiring you to trust, accept, and even tolerate each other. With simple controls (three buttons) and a loud voice, you can make the Balloon Friends UP and DOWN, exactly like your emotions.

Simple operation:

Just control the movement of your balloon to the left and right, and absorb the gas from your teammate to make yourself rise!

Simple mechanism:

You'll play in puzzle levels with different mechanisms and functions. Solve them and get to the end! Come and Start your tacit challenge! All that you need is to bring your Booming Voice along with your dear him/her(/it?). But please don't fight with each other, or at least try to be gentle.

Not-so-simple teammate

However, remember this: Dealing with the puzzles might not get you through the levels; dealing with your teammate might will.
